headline: Corpay Named to Newsweek’s List of 2025 Global Most Loved Workplaces®
summary: ATLANTA & NEW YORK, May 28, 2025--Newsweek Magazine recently announced the 2025 Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces®, developed in partnership with Most Loved Workplace®, a division of Best Practice Institute (BPI). – Corpay, Inc. (NYSE: CPAY), a leading corporate payments company, was ranked #39 on this prestigious list, which highlights companies across the globe where employees genuinely love to work.
